extendedInfo.description: Download the Craftsman Garage Door app for new Craftsman Garage Door Openers with AssureLinkâ¢ Connectivity. Canât remember if you closed your garage door? No need to worryâ¦ You can now use the Craftsman Garage Door app and your Android phone from anywhere to check if your garage door is open and then close it if necessary. Convenience. Security. Peace of mind. Works only with Craftsman Garage Door Opener models with AssureLinkâ¢ Connectivity. See Craftsman.com for details.With the Craftsman Garage Door app, you can:â¢CONVENIENTLY CHECK to see if your garage door is openor closed:- No need to drive back home after leaving for work, school, or vacation to make sure door is closed- No need to get out of bed to make sure door is closedâ¢CLOSE the door if necessary.â¢OPEN the door from anywhere while you are away from home to provide unplanned garage / home access to a family member, friend, contractor, etc.â¢TURN ON/OFF LIGHTS- Requires Craftsman AssureLinkâ¢ Plug-in-Light Control (sold separately / not included with Craftsman AssureLinkâ¢ Garage Door Openers).

reviews.title: Very bad, needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Can take several MINUTES for app to load, even on wimax 4g. Crashes repeatedly on orientation change. Needs a lot of work if this app is to accompany a 350 dollar garage door opener.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it\'s supposed to. I never have to worry about whether I closed the garage doors. I can open or close the garage doors from anywhere that has cell service.
reviews.author: Tyrone Robinson

reviews.title: Craftman door app
reviews.comment: App still need alot of code work and polish up finer points to speed up and stop reloading or refreshing device also clean up long waits of app require to boot up..... :(
reviews.author: Don Corbett

reviews.comment: The app is terrible it makes it so you have to put in your password every single time your phone goes out there is no widget for it it is very slow the alert screen and alert actions are left to be desired
reviews.author: Alex Belardinelli

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: Disable the security options under \"my account\" and it works even better without having to login every time.
reviews.author: Eric Franckowiak

reviews.title: No Support!
reviews.comment: Push notifications don\'t work for Android. There also should be more flexibility for alerts. you should be able to disable push alerts by device not by account.
reviews.author: Patrick Gormley

reviews.title: Opener and Application
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the app. and garage door opener for over a year now and I\'ve never encountered any issues.
reviews.author: Ralph Garcia

reviews.title: \342\227\206Open & Close Alerts! FINALLY\342\227\206
reviews.comment: Finally the recent update now alerts ur phone when the garaged is opened and closed. This feature is now worth more to have this app.
reviews.author: Brian Yu

reviews.title: Works much better now
reviews.comment: The app sucked untill I found that if you disable all the security all you have to do is open the app then touch the screen to open or close the door, they need to give you that info somewhere in the directions. To set it up, open the app, hit the Account option, log in,hit My Account, (you may have to log in again) then Passcode - leave it blank, then hit Security and clear all three boxes then hit done. Now it gets 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works but the app sucks
reviews.comment: The bad thing about this app is that it doesnt work very well. There is a choice to set up a pass code which works for a few hours until the system closes the app and the passcode than gets lost.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget
reviews.comment: Slick app, could REALLY use a one click widget :-) $19.99/yr sounds a tad steep after paying $200+ for the opener itself though. Dual account support?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garage door opener
reviews.comment: Best 250 bucks i never spent i convinced my neighbor to buy two and I\'d install both one for me and one for him this thing is amazing app works great couldn\'t be more exited over home improving
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App just doesn\'t work 95% of the time. The cool factor disappeared quickly once I realized you have to reboot your phone (evo4g) every time you use it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How to Save Your Login Information
reviews.comment: Given time I have hope for this App and this product line. To have the App save your login information go to edit and select security. Un-check the box requiring a login each time the app is run.  Then for next Christmas tell me how I can use this to control my Christmas lights.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uncheck
reviews.comment: It work good,but if all security options uncheck work even better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jimbo
reviews.comment: Software really sucks . Locks up my android . Sears help line passes the buck. The reason I bought this door opener was 4 this feature .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App sucks.
reviews.comment: Haven\'t had any updates for a long time and this app never works. It never loads to the main screen, just keeps saying loading.
reviews.author: Sean M
